name: Traffic Car Racing Simulator
description:
Ultimate speedy car racing game is here. So let the wheels burn the city road tracks and let the hot wheel race begins. This classic game has all the racing enthusiast that you want to have. Use your incredible driving skills in an arcade car racing game to win a higher performance car.

Start the traffic racing in your extra-ordinary ultimate sports car and win the game. The furious extreme car racing is on with some drift modes, so do some action based drifting on the roads and be the first to win all the racing tracks but avoid city traffic accidents. If you are the ultimate lover of the fast traffic car racer then you are on the right track. Feel the energy and start the speedy car real driving now.

Experience the most crazy stunt racing. Show all your sports driving skills in the real car racing city road. Accelerate the auto with the drift modes to get some extra points and get to the next level. Do not collide with other traffic fast cars. Take the city traffic racing to the next level by showing the extreme fast sports driving moves. You have the most unique model of the modern racing car. Be the fast drive traffic car racer and try to win the coins on the speedy car city road so that your fuel does not get finished.
The ultimate street racing has been started now and you are going to enjoy the thrill with the ultimate car racing drive on the busiest traffic road. Get ready for the racing for real escape with no limits. The best ever stunning physics racing game is waiting for you drive the fast car. Through this game you can fulfil your dreams by driving the city traffic racing car.

Do your best and get to the finish line as soon as possible with some extra speedway racing. Drive your sports car on the bumpy and full of adventurous city road tracks and become the expert of the real car racing drift challenge. Do some thrilling stunts with huge jumps on the roads with your luxuries sports car. There will be dangerous obstacles that you have to face in the insane death racing game. So fasten up your seat belt and get the most points without the collision of the other city car.

Enjoy the most epic drifting formula one car racing game. Kids can also play and get themselves amused in playing the impossible sports racing track game ever. Extreme GT stunt racing game is now here for the sports lovers. Download the most exciting speedy car racer in the world of the traffic racing simulator.
FEATURES
- Real 3D fast car racing graphics
- Incredible camera view and the ultimate sound system
- 10 exciting levels to complete the traffic racing
- Realistic traffic rules
- Easy to handle
- 2 modes for the real racing
- Best physics engine with real crashing
- 15 best sports car to choose
